name: Devil, Please!
description:
A devil's minion simulator. The devil's minion  is working in the temple where he  has to perform the rituals on order to receive currency for his master. Different objects and sacrifices are used in rituals. The goal of the game is make the ritual rignt and earn as much gold, as Satan need.

How to play: 

  1. Click your LBM on the client.
  2. Read the description.
  3. Guess what the client need.
  4. Choose the right igredients.
  5. Mix them.
  6. Complete the ritual
  7. Profit!
